Title: Reconnoitering the Rim
Plot: Competition arrives for Swearengen in the form of the Bella Union, a new gambling outfit from Chicago operated by savvy Cy Tolliver, Madame Joanie Stubbs and gaming guru Eddie Sawyer. Hickok puts up precious collateral in a poker game with McCall; Bullock and Star strike a deal with Swearengen on a lot for their store and, with help from Hickok and Utter, set to building; Brom threatens Swearengen with The Pinkertons before he and Dan Dority are dispatched to reconnoiter his claim.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Bill Bolender, Dean Rader-Duval, Joel McKinnon Miller, Clay Wilcox, Tahmus Rounds, Tom Simmons, Bree Seanna Wall, Timothy Omundson, Ray McKinnon
